transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji Baising ji license se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: A, Namaskar mam, Shushant Tripathi baat kar raha hu, senior manager IndiaMART se.
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Kaise hai aap?
Customer: Badhiya sir, aap bataiye. Actually, a, badhiya, a, actually Sanchika ko maine kal bola tha aapse video meeting karne ke liye, toh aapki video meeting ho gayi woh?
Customer: Kal nahi hui thi sir, abhi mere paas morning mein call aaya tha toh maine unko bola ki mujhe evening mein karna. Abhi jo issue tha woh maine unko bata diya. Maine kaha woh apne end se aap dekhiye kyunki mere yahan se toh koi call aa nahi rahi hai mujhe.
Executive: Theek hai. Toh main yeh video meeting jo hai na aapki evening ke liye schedule kara raha hu, theek hai? Baaki jo hai na aap agar kuch bhi issue rehta hai toh aap mere ko directly call kar lena. Yeh ticket aapka open tha toh maine kaha isko close, haan yeh isi number pe kar lijiyega, koi baat nahi.
Customer: Theek hai, bas sir yeh issue aa se aa kyun raha hai ki leads nahi aati hai aur iske karan.
Executive: Main, main aapko batata hu, isme hai kya, lead mam sold out ho rahi hai, theek hai? Ab waha par kya hai ki agar mere paas lead sold out ho rahi hai, sold out ka matlab hai ki maan lijiye lead post hui 10, ab purchase karne wale hai waha par 100 log. Toh woh dividation of leads jo hai woh zyada hai. That's why it happens, a, but main...
Customer: But itni jaldi show toh honi chahiye na, at present agar hamare paas show hogi toh mujhe...
Executive: Mam dekhiye, abhi ek cheez bataiye, maan lijiye kisi ne jo hai na night mein 10 baje lead post ki, theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Night mein 10 baje lead post ki, ek lead jo hai na portal se sold out show karne lagti hai agar paanch logo se zyada usne kisi ko purchase kar liya, theek hai? Ek lead ko sirf paanch log purchase kar sakte hai, then woh lead jo hai na sold out show karne lagti hai. Toh waha par paanch logo ko purchase karne ke liye mam bahut zyada time nahi lagta hai, aapko bhi pata hai shayad jo hai na woh paanch minute, 10 minute mein hi jo hai na itna ho jayega kyunki agar lead limited hai.
Customer: Itni jaldi nahi lagti hai sir.
Customer: Just now pe hi woh show nahi karta, just now aayega but sold out kar dete hai. Woh maine aur Sanchika ko bola tha aapne kal ek, aapne kal ek screenshot diya tha toh aap jo hai na aaj ke din mein bhi agar jo hai na aisa kuch bhi rehta hai toh aap mere ko at least jo hai na do se teen screenshot dijiye, a, different timing ke toh main aage escalate karunga. Ek lead ka toh woh bhi bol degi team jo hai na ki ek lead toh sold out ho bhi sakti hai koi badi baat nahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai, kyunki two, three days se na phone pe bhi yahi ho raha tha.
Executive: Nahi koi baat nahi, maine isiliye bola hai ki aap mere ko ek baar send kar do, theek hai? Aap do, teen screenshot aap mere ko share, share kar do, then main aage escalate kar dunga, koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Theek, theek hai sir, theek hai. Baaki aapka video meeting wala ticket main close kar raha hu, evening mein jab aap free ho jao toh main karwa dunga.
Customer: Theek hai sir. Okay.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving leads.

- Wants to know why leads are sold out quickly.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the lead distribution process.

- Executive asked for screenshots for escalation.

- Video meeting rescheduled for the evening.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, sold out, video meeting, escalation
